desc: I am consulting for PE Capital (PEC) here in Melbourne, Australia, a boutique investment management company, focusing on alternative property assets predominately in greenfield (growth corridors) sites. I currently have a draft IM but I feel it's not professional enough, is quite repetitive and lacks the required creative financial marketing flare that will make the readers want more! It also requires a little more content information & work from my end as well as the various financials to be added.As you can imagine, there is quite a large amount of private & confidential information contained in this draft IM so I am open to understanding how you can quote on improving this without seeing the draft document & financials. I maybe able to get the prospective service provider to sign a non-disclosure agreement as required.I am wanting the final product IM completed by mid Dec so it would be great to obtain a quote to understand what’s involved.I would also like to understand what options & associated costs are available to create a secondary version of this IM in animated video format so it could be posted on website, Linkedin or sent as an attachment via email to prospective clients with a narrative.The type of work I require is much like what 'Yell Creative' do.

desc: Business Development ExecutiveMilton Keynes - Self EmployedLocation:	Work from home or our Milton Keynes OfficeSalary:	Commission onlyHours:	Flexible to suitContract:	Self-employed, invoice basisEnd Date:	OngoingWho are PROJEXISHere at PROJEXIS we provide services and solutions to help empower business to deliver professional, cost-controlled and quality work into their clients.  We enable business to save time and money by providing all the elements required to deliver work, tasks and projects with complete control with a unified and collaborative approach.No matter the size of business, or the industry – our systems, tools, processes and consulting can work with business to empower the client journey.  From our bespoke and feature packed Client Management System to our 4-step delivery method (PRODIO), the tools and services are designed to work hand-in-hand with business operations and processes.The RoleManage your own time by working as one of our self-employed, Business Development Executives. We are specifically looking for people who are experienced and comfortable in selling client management consultancy and SaaS solutions to B2B clients of all sizes. If you feel you can sell our services, tools and products and promote the values and aspirations of PROJEXIS we would like to hear from you.We are passionate about the Client Journey and Client Experience. You’ll need a professional approach and a willingness to develop with our company as we accelerate our growth.  As our business growth accelerates, there will be opportunity to join the team as a full time salaried consultant.Earning PotentialInitially we will show the full range of our services, products and tools. Once you fully understand our systems and how we work, you will then be charged with growing the business. You will be paid a commission for every product you sign up.How to applyPlease submit your CV to us via careers@[url removed, login to view]Alternatively, please contact Allan Allsopp - Operations Director on 0845 862 1630 for an informal discussion
